wf_workflow_version.description: Approval workflow for corrected major internal and reporting errors
wf_workflow_version.name: QC approval workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: Approval workflow for corrected major internal and reporting errors
wf_workflow.name: QC approval workflow

sys_variable_value.value:
Dear ${user.first_name},
This is an automatic email to inform you that the correction of ${number} with severity ${state} and error type ${type} has been approved by ${assigned_to}.
In case you would like to check the record in the QC app, you can use the button below:
${mail_script:qc_record_link_button}
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Dear ${user.first_name},
This is an automatic email to inform you that the correction of ${number} with severity ${state} and error type ${type} has been approved by ${assigned_to}.
In case you would like to check the record in the QC app, you can use the button below:
${mail_script:qc_record_link_button}
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
